entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 8:31 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow and ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
